title: PMS 2.0 348 - Super Bowl Preview, Derrick Henry, Sean McDermott, Ryan Clark, Carson Palmer, Mike Alstott, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys look at all the different Super Bowl prop bets and do a deep dive into the game as they make their picks on who's going to win on Sunday. Joining the program is 2x Pro Bowler, 2x All-Pro, 2x NFL rushing leader, a member of the 2,000 yard club, RB for the Tennessee Titans, Derrick Henry to chat about his season and the conversation with Eddie George that really set up his run of dominance (17:06-23:02). Next, Bills Head Coach Sean McDermott joins the show to chat about this last season, his style of coaching, what he had to adjust when he became a Head Coach, and much more in an incredible conversation (23:04-49:22). Next, Super Bowl Champion, Pro Bowler, 12 year NFL veteran, NFL analyst on ESPN and friend of the show, Ryan Clark joins Pat and AJ Hawk to chat about the game on Sunday and ultimately who's going to win (51:14-1:06:49). Next, 3x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, and friend of the show, Carson Palmer, joins the program to chat about the QB's in this Super Bowl, and his brother's work with Trevor Lawrence (1:22:32-1:38:09). Later, Pat and AJ Hawk welcome Tampa Bay Buccaneer legend, Super Bowl Champion, 6x Pro Bowler and 4x All-Pro, Mike Alstott joins the show to chat about his career and the Bucs chances in the Super Bowl. Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
